title: EP 8: Six Brutal Truths That Changed Everything.
description:
You are responsible for your success! This is just one of the six life-changing lessons Steve shares in this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur. When we do the work in one area of our lives, all areas have a better chance of succeeding. 

As we continue to grow within our business and personal life, we discover that even though some lessons are learned the hard way, not all of them have to be. We have the opportunity to glean from others like Steve and achieve our goals faster. 

Your circle of influence matters. Does yours support your vision, or are you allowing negativity to tear you down? Tune in to learn more about how you can re-invent your game and make a HUGE difference in not only your life but the lives of those around you. 

 

What You’ll Learn:

  • Why must we choose a circle of people who will stretch us, making us better. 
  • How we have the opportunity to learn from others’ mistakes.
  • What it means to live a life of firing all four cylinders.
  • And much more!

 

Favorite Quote:

“If you’re not spending your time working on your dream, someone else will hire you to build theirs.”

 

  • Steve Schabacker

 

How to Get Involved:

Steve Schabaker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
